Topic.Title: Hyperlinks to external pages within Quest

Posts.EditableText: Is it possible to display a hyperlink to an external page within the game start message such as sources for contributor profiles and links for donation purposes?
Posts.HTML: Is it possible to display a hyperlink to an external page within the game start message such as sources for contributor profiles and links for donation purposes?

Posts.EditableText:
It should be possible to output a normal HTML link; that's what Gamebook mode does if you have a page of type 'link'. In case you don't know HTML, that would look something like: 
<a href="https://some.address/somewhere">link text here</a>
Posts.HTML:
It should be possible to output a normal HTML link; that's what Gamebook mode does if you have a page of type 'link'.

In case you don't know HTML, that would look something like:

<a href="https://some.address/somewhere">link text here</a>

Posts.EditableText: Will that be inserted inside the middle of a msg() or on it's own?
Posts.HTML: Will that be inserted inside the middle of a msg() or on it's own?

Posts.EditableText: Update: I've got it resolved, thank you!
Posts.HTML: Update: I've got it resolved, thank you!
